name: Builders AI
description:
DISCALIMER READ AT ALL COST: The WebGL version its worse and more buggy than  the downloadable version, I recomend you to play the downloadable version

Controls: Move with "A" ,"D"; Jump with "Space"; and interact (with robots and flags) with "E". You should die a couple times in the tutorial where the big gap

CheatCodes In the main menu there is a "?" button, if you type in the text area "LevelSelector" you will be redirectet in to a level selector Impossible jump solution Vid:
